title: Tiafoe's top Hot Shots: Big Foe relives best moments
description: Showman Frances Tiafoe has made a habit of lighting up courts around the world and dazzling scores of crowds since he burst onto the scene at the Next Gen ATP Finals presented by PIF in 2018. With dynamic play matching his personality, ‘Big Foe’ has become one of the pre-eminent crowd-pleasers on the ATP Tour. He has risen the PIF ATP Rankings and gained a host of new fans through his thrilling style of play and infectious personality. [ATP APP] Recently, the World No. 15 reminisced on his most scintillating moments on court, tracing the shots that have defined his game and career. Tiafoe relived his most memorable hot shots from tournaments in Milan, Barcelona, Toronto and more. Which are Tiafoe's favourites? Watch the full video below to find out.     [NEWSLETTER FORM]
excerpt: Discover what Frances Tiafoe thinks of the most memorable Hot Shots he has hit during his career, giving insight into his career and style of play.
text: Frances Tiafoe American reacts to most epic moments October 14, 2024 ATP Frances Tiafoe is one of the most entertaining players on the ATP Tour. html:
Frances Tiafoe

American reacts to most epic moments

October 14, 2024

ATP

Frances Tiafoe is one of the most entertaining players on the ATP Tour. By ATP Staff

Showman Frances Tiafoe has made a habit of lighting up courts around the world and dazzling scores of crowds since he burst onto the scene at the Next Gen ATP Finals presented by PIF in 2018.

With dynamic play matching his personality, ‘Big Foe’ has become one of the pre-eminent crowd-pleasers on the ATP Tour. He has risen the PIF ATP Rankings and gained a host of new fans through his thrilling style of play and infectious personality.

Recently, the World No. 15 reminisced on his most scintillating moments on court, tracing the shots that have defined his game and career. Tiafoe relived his most memorable hot shots from tournaments in Milan, Barcelona, Toronto and more.

Which are Tiafoe's favourites? Watch the full video below to find out.
